title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When opening a file that is already open in an editor and selecting a different type of editor, nothing happens. The old editor remains active.
EB: When opening a file that is already open and selecting a different type of editor, a new editor of the selected type should open for the file.
SR:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file test.xml.
4. The scripted resource editor example is used as the default editor for XML files, so it opens for test.xml.
5. In the Navigator, select test.xml.
6. Right-click and choose 'Open With...' / Default Text Editor.
7. The editor does not change, the scripted resource editor example remains active.

Expected:
- The Default Text Editor should open for test.xml, replacing the scripted resource editor example.

NOTES: Searching for an existing open file should also consider editor types.
